resources.string: Archimedes described it as greater than 3 10/71 and less than 3 10/70. Today that number is called

To what system was Leibnitz referring when he wrote this? I enclose an attempt to devise a new numerical system. By basing it on the number 2 instead of the number 10, I am able to write all numbers in terms of 0 and 1.
The development of differential and integral calculus is attributed to
The means of graphically representing functions of variables occurred with the introduction of coordinates by what mathematician?
